title: Henri Bendel
seo_title: WestHouse is proud to announce its newest partnership with Henri Bendel
seo_description: WestHouse is proud to announce its newest partnership with Henri Bendel
contents:
WestHouse is proud to announce its newest partnership with Henri Bendel. Henri Bendel’s Fifth Avenue Flagship store, only two blocks away from WestHouse, is one of New York’s iconic landmarks with its beautiful and one of a kind Lalique windows.

Henri Bendel is the perfect Holiday shopping destination, where you will find handbags, jewelry, fashion accessories and more… Make WestHouse your house during this holiday season, and enjoy our tree beautifully decorated by Henri Bendel, with a selection of their best ornaments - until January 2nd.
